summary:
Are you fed up with your wife/husband? Don't want to kill your spouse? Need something, that works like a divorce?
With just 1 console command you can be free of your troubles. You'll be free to marry anyone just as if you haven't marry before. Your spouse will be marriable again, and will not hate you.
descriptionHtml:
There was never any form of divorce in Skyrim.
For some people it's a good thing, some people complain about it.
There are many different methods posted on the wikis and forums.
I tested all of them, or at least all I was able to find and chose the best option which is a combination of others.

Just open game console, click your spouse (wife/husband) and type "bat divorce". This will run a batch of commands setting you as not married, your spouse as not married and resetting marriage quests. After that wait a bit for AI to get back to normal (e.g. for your ex-spouse to leave your home and/or close the shop). My personal recommendation is 24 hours of game time.
author: Erundil

files.name: Divorce
files.changelogHtml: Some cosmetics done to comments in the file. Nothing changed really.
